title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher-Ranger-Teachers The TRT program allows educators to experience working in a National Park. During the summer, educators work side by side with Park Rangers and gain hands-on experience working with resources at Palo Alto Battlefield. Teachers will develop lesson plans based on their park experience for use in the classroom. For detailed information on current teacher-ranger positions, visit our TRT page. All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers
